title: National Tuberculosis Elimination
summary: Goal to eliminate TB in India by 2025
full_text: This policy strengthens early detection, free treatment, nutritional support, and digital tracking of TB cases.
text_for_nlp: national tuberculosis elimination. goal to eliminate tb in india by 2025. this policy strengthens early detection, free treatment, nutritional support, and digital tracking of tb cases.

title: Polio Eradication Initiative
summary: Nationwide vaccination drive to eradicate polio
full_text: India launched the Pulse Polio Immunization campaign with free polio drops, leading to India being declared polio-free in 2014.
text_for_nlp: polio eradication initiative. nationwide vaccination drive to eradicate polio. india launched the pulse polio immunization campaign with free polio drops, leading to india being declared polio-free in 2014.

title: National Mental Health Programme
summary: Focus on mental health awareness, care facilities, and training
full_text: The NMHP aims to integrate mental health into general healthcare, establish psychiatric units in hospitals, and train medical officers in mental health.
text_for_nlp: national mental health programme. focus on mental health awareness, care facilities, and training. the nmhp aims to integrate mental health into general healthcare, establish psychiatric units in hospitals, and train medical officers in mental health.

title: Janani Suraksha Yojana (JSY)
summary: Promotes institutional deliveries to reduce maternal mortality
full_text: JSY provides financial incentives to pregnant women to deliver in healthcare facilities, ensuring safe childbirth and postnatal care.
text_for_nlp: janani suraksha yojana (jsy). promotes institutional deliveries to reduce maternal mortality. jsy provides financial incentives to pregnant women to deliver in healthcare facilities, ensuring safe childbirth and postnatal care.

title: Mission Indradhanush
summary: Immunization drive to cover all children against preventable diseases
full_text: Mission Indradhanush aims to increase full immunization coverage to at least 90% by targeting children under 2 years and pregnant women.
